projects.name: Gallery
projects.description: This gallery showcases a curated collection of my photography. Each photo highlights the emotions and stories of the subjects, bringing out the depth and beauty in everyday life. The project reflects my passion for capturing people and exploring lighting and composition to enhance the overall narrative of the images.
